titles.title: State of Utah Wildlife Management Sovereignty Act

To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to provide that inclusion of the gray wolf, or any distinct population segment of gray wolf, in the State of Utah on any list of endangered species or threatened species shall have no force or effect.
State of Utah Wildlife Management Sovereignty Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: State of Utah Wildlife Management Sovereignty Act - Amends the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to provide that the inclusion of the gray wolf, or any distinct population segment of gray wolf, in Utah on any list of endangered or threatened species shall have no force or effect.
